user_question: How can I make a traditional Moroccan tagine and generate an image of a tagine dish?
final_answer: Traditional Moroccan tagine recipe: 1 kg lamb, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp ground cinnamon, 1 tsp ground turmeric, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup dried apricots, 1 cup chickpeas, 1/2 cup almonds, salt to taste. Image of a tagine dish generated. Traditional tagine is cooked slowly in a conical clay pot over low heat.

steps.content: Traditional tagine is cooked slowly in a conical clay pot over low heat, allowing the flavors to meld together.

Traditional Moroccan tagine recipe: 1 kg lamb, 2 tbsp olive oil, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp ground cinnamon, 1 tsp ground turmeric, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup dried apricots, 1 cup chickpeas, 1/2 cup almonds, salt to taste. Image of a tagine dish generated. Traditional tagine is cooked slowly in a conical clay pot over low heat.
